materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a waterfall in Penang, Malaysia. The waterfall is in the center of the photograph, amidst thick vegetation on either side. At the bottom left of the photograph, there is a small sheltered dwelling. A man is standing by the railings in front of the dwelling. To his right, there are three men sitting along the bridge at the bottom of the waterfall. There is another man sitting on a rock on the right of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java The Waterfall, Penang
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Waterfalls Pulau Pinang (Malaysia : State)
